summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 12th Avenue Northwest, from West 83rd Street to West 85th Street; 13th Avenue Northwest, from West 83rd Street to West 85th Street; 14th Avenue Northwest, from West 80th Street to West 85th Street; West 83rd Street, from 12th Avenue Northwest to 14th Avenue Northwest; by grading the same; constructing concrete curbs and gutters, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 56536, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
